name: rules_erlang 4.0.0-beta.1
body:
4.0 pushes parts of dependency resolution into the bazel execution phase, eliminating the need for gazelle, and making up for the lack of fine grained info at analysis time with persistent workers that manage their own cache. This should make larger projects, especially those with multiple apps, easier to work with.

## What's Changed
* Eliminate the need for gazelle language extension by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/255


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.15.2...4.0.0-beta.1

name: rules_erlang 3.15.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/269
* Match the MODULE/WORKSPACE dep versions in the test dir by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/270
* Simplify and reorder test WORKSPACE.bazel by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/271
* Adopt latest rabbitmq-server-buildenv:linux-rbe for RBE by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/274
* Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 6.0.2 to 6.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/278
* Support pkg with version by @lixen-wg2 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/276
* Add common_root_as_var to use with nif by @lixen-wg2 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/277
* Add macos to test matrix by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/279
* Add shebang to scripts by @lixen-wg2 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/275
* Revert "Add shebang to scripts" by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/281
* Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 6.0.3 to 6.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/280
* Revert "Revert "Add shebang to scripts"" by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/282


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.15.1...3.15.2

name: rules_erlang 3.15.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add an analysis level test by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/247
* OTP 26.2 compatiblity by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/252
* Attempt to fix a flake in `erl_attrs_to_json_SUITE` by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/253
* Bump actions/upload-artifact from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/254
* [asn1] Add erlang_asn1 rule by @lixen-wg2 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/248
* [xrl/yrl] add xrl and yrl rule by @lixen-wg2 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/250
* [diameter] Add erlang_dia rule by @lixen-wg2 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/249
* Copy files rather than symlink when constructing ERL_LIBS dirs by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/251
* Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 5.0.2 to 6.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/256
* Bump ncipollo/release-action from 1.13.0 to 1.14.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/257
* Gazelle GitHub hosted app fix by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/258
* Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/259
* Let the root module's definition win when versions match by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/261
* Use 26.2 in CI by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/264
* Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/262
* erlang_build rule enhancements by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/263
* Adopt latest rabbitmq-server-buildenv:linux-rbe for RBE by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/265
* No longer include the root directory in internal erlang tars by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/266

## New Contributors
* @lixen-wg2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/248

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.14.0...3.15.0

name: rules_erlang 3.10.0
body:
This release updates the names of the toolchains in the generated `@erlang_config` repo, so if your project has defined and registered named erlangs, such as `"@erlang_config//24:toolchain"` & `"@erlang_config//24:toolchain2"`, they are now generated as `"@erlang_config//24:toolchain_major"` & `"@erlang_config//24:toolchain_major_minor"`. The new names are easier to make sense of when debugging toolchain resolution.

## What's Changed
* A few bits of cleanup by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/190
* Correct the contents of 'registered' key in .app files by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/192
* Drop the source_archive macro by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/164
* `.ez` support by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/175


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.14...3.10.0

name: rules_erlang 3.9.14
body:
## What's Changed
* Mark "deps" as mergable by gazelle for a number of rules by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/182
* Track gazelle:excludes for resolving umbrella apps correctly by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/183
* Add a directive for resolving erlang apps explicitly in gazelle by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/184
* Do not generate wildcard (glob/native.glob) "srcs" in gazelle by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/187
* Add generated files to BUILD files for rebar projects by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/188


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.13...3.9.14

name: rules_erlang 3.9.13

* Allow test suites to -include_lib the subject under test by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/179
* Always insert load statements at index 0 in app.bzl files by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/181


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.12...3.9.13

name: rules_erlang 3.9.11
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix -include_lib statements referring to an app itself by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/168
* gazelle: add support for `{chatterbox, {pkg, ts_chatterbox}}` style deps in rebar.config files by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/167
* gazelle: GenFiles take precedence over files found on disk by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/170
* Add a rule for generating a moduleindex.yaml without gazelle by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/173
* Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 4.2.3 to 4.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/171
* Adopt latest rabbitmq-server-buildenv:linux-rbe for RBE by @github-actions in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/172


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.10...3.9.11

body:

* Add erlang_app_testonly directive by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/162
* Mark plt rules as "testonly" by default by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/163
* gazelle: compact rules use wildcard by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/166


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.9...3.9.10
